message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000.  I believe this product will be very valuable to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to consider $13,000?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,500?
